main.name: Joshua Michalik
main.contactmessage: When you have a project or just an idea, reach out to me and I'd be happy to help you take the next steps.

resume.skillmessage: Web application and software developer experienced in not only in programming, but also in expert-led training and large-scale team management.

education.description: A once in a lifetime opportunity to be educated by world-class programmers bringing their A-game to future developers. We were taught a thorough foundation of object-oriented software development based in C# and JavaScript. During this course, we became familiar with everything from pseudocode and editors to SQL queries and HTTP requests, designing and building our own projects from the groundup day after day.

work.title: Senior UX God
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

testimonials.text: Joshua has been honest and trustworthy in all of our dealings with him. He has a natural aptitude for computer work and has been able to learn new tasks for needs that arise. He has been industrious and dependable.
